LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.label: Xeno Limb Syndrome
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.description:
A syndrome commonly occurring in pre-spacer worlds when one or more neurally interfaced bionics are installed. Due to the lack of biological receptors, the body will temporarily reject the bionic connection to the nervous system.
There are five classifications of severity for thes symptoms..
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.Initial.label: Initial
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.LV1_Initial.label: LV.1 Initial
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.LV2_Minor.label: LV.2 Minor
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.LV3_Serious.label: LV.3 Serious
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.initial.label: initial
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.LV1_initial.label: LV.1 Initial
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.LV2_minor.label: LV.2 Minor
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShock.stages.LV3_serious.label: LV.3 Serious
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShockRemove.label: Phantom Limb Syndrome
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShockRemove.description: A commonly occurring syndrome in pre-spacer worlds when neurally interfaced bionics are removed.
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShockRemove.comps.HediffComp_R: Phantom Limb Syndrome has been cured
LanguageData.DMS_BionicShockRemove.stages.pain.label: pain
LanguageData.DMS_FilterShock.label: Emotional Misalignment
LanguageData.DMS_FilterShock.description: A syndrome caused by a cognitive dissonance created by the user's mind conflicting with the installed bionics. This internal conflict causes emotional trauma as the user struggles to adjust to their new baseline.
LanguageData.DMS_FilterShock.stages.catatonic.label: catatonic
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkFatalTrigger.label: Fatal Trigger
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkFatalTrigger.description: Due to the instability of this device, this safty protocol was created to automatically eject and destroy the disabled mechlink before it can cause catastrophic damage to the user's brain.
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkKillSwitch.label: Kill Switch
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkKillSwitch.description: This device will destroy the mechlink by overloading the neural interface after the user's death.
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkOverload.label: N.A.C.S.
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkOverload.description: Neural-Auxiliary Computation and Control System- this system's unique protocol allows the user to connect with existing mech and Automatroid tech.
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkOverload.stages.low.label: low
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkOverload.stages.medium.label: medium
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkOverload.stages.high.label: high
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkOverload.stages.danger.label: danger
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkRejection.label: Mechlink Rejection
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkRejection.description: Due to limited technology and the lack of medical nanites, there are some side-effect after installing this mechlink. It will take some time before the implantee's nervous system adjusts to its presence.
LanguageData.DMS_MechlinkRejection.stages.fever.label: fever
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticRejection.label: Synthetic Rejection
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticRejection.description: Due to modifications of circulatory system, synthetic bionic enhancements can be rejected temporarily by the body. The effect does not last long, and the body's abiity to fight infections is reduced for its duration.
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticRejection.comps.HediffComp_: Bionic Rejection Syndrome has been cured.
LanguageData.DMS_WeaponInprint.label: calibration
LanguageData.DMS_WeaponInprint.description:
This Synth is integrated with an adaptive mechanism that allows its body to develop reflexive actions based on its handling experience and increase the density of artificial muscles in specific parts to better adapt to the weapon. As a result, an MG-1 can achieve superior combat effectiveness when operating the weapon it is adapted to.
However, overfitting issues in the system prevent it from calibrating itself to only one weapon, usually the first weapon equipped upon startup.
LanguageData.DMS_WeaponInprint.descriptionShort: Adapt to specific weapons and have better combat effectiveness when using adapted weapons. the effect will increase over time.
LanguageData.DMS_WeaponInprint.stages.maximized.label: maximized
